source:
TEXT_LUCKZA024_03366_SEQ_00 Quest Sync
A flyer for attracting prospective employees catches your eye.
target:
TEXT_LUCKZA024_03366_SEQ_00特殊ルール： レベルアジャスト
モルド・スークの人材募集の張り紙に、お手伝いさん募集と書かれている。

source: TEXT_LUCKZA024_03366_TODO_03<tab>Express your /doubt to the Mord taskmaster.
target: TEXT_LUCKZA024_03366_TODO_03<tab>雇用主のモルド族に「問い詰める」をする

source: TEXT_LUCKZA024_03366_POSTER03366_000_000<tab>Onest paye foR onest woRk! No expeerRians ness ess haiRy!
target:
TEXT_LUCKZA024_03366_POSTER03366_000_000お手伝いさん募集中！
未経験でもできる簡単なお仕事です。
アットホームな職場で、楽に稼ぎましょう！

source: TEXT_LUCKZA024_03366_SYSTEM_000_001<tab>It appears to be a job advertisement. Speak with the Mord taskmaster for details.
target:
TEXT_LUCKZA024_03366_SYSTEM_000_001人材募集の張り紙のようだ。
詳しい話は「雇用主のモルド族」から聞いてみよう。

source: TEXT_LUCKZA024_03366_SYSTEM_000_010<tab>It appears to be a job advertisement, most likely written by the Mord taskmaster.
target:
TEXT_LUCKZA024_03366_SYSTEM_000_010人材募集の張り紙のようだ。
詳しい話は「雇用主のモルド族」から聞いてみよう。

source: TEXT_LUCKZA024_03366_MORDOYASHIGE03366_000_020<tab>Mmm... You'll do. Here for work, are we?
target:
TEXT_LUCKZA024_03366_MORDOYASHIGE03366_000_020おや、旅人サン。
求人広告を見て、来てくれたネ？

source: TEXT_LUCKZA024_03366_MORDOYASHIGE03366_000_021<tab>Good, good! Honest pay for honest work, that's my motto!
target:
TEXT_LUCKZA024_03366_MORDOYASHIGE03366_000_021おお、それはそれはありがとネ！
ちゃんと報酬払うから、よろしく頼むネ！

source: TEXT_LUCKZA024_03366_MORDOYASHIGE03366_000_022<tab>Your timing could not be better. I have a job for you.
target:
TEXT_LUCKZA024_03366_MORDOYASHIGE03366_000_022それじゃ、さっそくで悪いけど、
ひとつお仕事をお願いするネ。

source: TEXT_LUCKZA024_03366_MORDOYASHIGE03366_000_023<tab>Take this package to my client, who is outside the village, to the south. Mord fellow, you will know him when you see him. Probably.
target:
TEXT_LUCKZA024_03366_MORDOYASHIGE03366_000_023この荷物を、モルド・スークの南で待ってる、
取引相手のモルド族に渡してネ。

source: TEXT_LUCKZA024_03366_MORDOYASHIGE03366_000_024<tab>Now, listen carefully. You must not peek inside, no matter what! Is that clear? Good. Now, off you go!
target:
TEXT_LUCKZA024_03366_MORDOYASHIGE03366_000_024もちろんだけど、荷物は中身を見ちゃダメヨ。
とてとて大事なものだからネ。
それじゃ、よろしく頼んだヨ。

source: TEXT_LUCKZA024_03366_MORDOYASHIGE03366_000_030<tab>You understood my instructions, yes? Then why are you still here?
target:
TEXT_LUCKZA024_03366_MORDOYASHIGE03366_000_030とてとて大切な荷物を、
モルド・スークの南で待ってる取引相手に渡してネ。
よろしく頼んだヨ。

source: TEXT_LUCKZA024_03366_MORDSUSPICIOUS03366_000_040<tab>Ah, there is the parcel. Get <var 08 E905 ((her)) ((him)) /var>!
target:
TEXT_LUCKZA024_03366_MORDSUSPICIOUS03366_000_040へっへっへっ、待ってたヨ。
その荷物、オレたちがいただくネ！
お前ら、ヤッチマイナー！

source: TEXT_LUCKZA024_03366_MORDOYASHIGE03366_000_050<tab>You are back!? But that was not how─ Ahem! The client will ah...re-unpurse you, I mean, reimburse you. Now, be off!
target:
TEXT_LUCKZA024_03366_MORDOYASHIGE03366_000_050おや、どうしたネ？
モルド・スークの南で待つ取引相手に、
その荷物を届けてヨ！

source: TEXT_LUCKZA024_03366_MORDSUSPICIOUS03366_000_060<tab>You were not supposed to fight back! Not fair, not fair!
target:
TEXT_LUCKZA024_03366_MORDSUSPICIOUS03366_000_060ひ、ひぇ～！？
こんな強いなんて話、聞いてないネ！

source: TEXT_LUCKZA024_03366_MORDSUSPICIOUS03366_000_061<tab>Our job was to steal the package, not to hurt anyone, I swear!
target:
TEXT_LUCKZA024_03366_MORDSUSPICIOUS03366_000_061ごめんなさいネ！
オレたちは荷物を奪うよう雇われただけネ。

source: TEXT_LUCKZA024_03366_MORDSUSPICIOUS03366_000_062<tab>Ask the taskmaster! Yes! He will tell you everything.
target:
TEXT_LUCKZA024_03366_MORDSUSPICIOUS03366_000_062詳しい話は、アンタの「雇用主のモルド族」を問い詰めてネ！
それじゃ、ネ！

TEXT_LUCKZA024_03366_MORDSUSPICIOUS03366_000_070ひ、ひぇ！？
オレはこの人に、謝るよう言いに来ただけネ！
だから、許してネ！

source: TEXT_LUCKZA024_03366_MORDOYASHIGE03366_000_080<tab>Is there a problem? Still looking for the client, are we?
target:
TEXT_LUCKZA024_03366_MORDOYASHIGE03366_000_080ど、どど、ど、どうしたネ？
はは、早く、モルド・スークの南で待つ取引相手に、
その荷物を届けてヨ！

source: TEXT_LUCKZA024_03366_SYSTEM_000_081<tab>He seems to be hiding something. Use the <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>doubt<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> emote to wring the truth from him.
target:
TEXT_LUCKZA024_03366_SYSTEM_000_081激しく動揺しているようだ……。
「雇用主のモルド族」を「問い詰め」てみよう。

TEXT_LUCKZA024_03366_MORDOYASHIGE03366_000_090ひ、ひぇ～！？　ごめんなさいネ！
洗いざらい説明するから、許してほしいヨ～！

source: TEXT_LUCKZA024_03366_MORDOYASHIGE03366_000_091<tab>The truth is, there is no client. And the package is full of nothing but rocks. Not expensive ones, either. Just rocks!
target:
TEXT_LUCKZA024_03366_MORDOYASHIGE03366_000_091実は取引相手なんていないネ。
預けた荷物も、石ころヨ。

source: TEXT_LUCKZA024_03366_MORDOYASHIGE03366_000_092<tab>I hire people to deliver the parcel and another group of thugs to steal it. When they return to me empty-handed, I demand compensation for the loss of my wares. No blood spilled, just coin changing hands, that is all!
target:
TEXT_LUCKZA024_03366_MORDOYASHIGE03366_000_092雇ったヤツらに荷物を奪わせ、
手ぶらで帰ってきたお手伝いさんに、
弁償させてたヨ……。

source: TEXT_LUCKZA024_03366_MORDSUSPICIOUS03366_000_093<tab>Please, boss, no more. This is too complicated, too dangerous!
target:
TEXT_LUCKZA024_03366_MORDSUSPICIOUS03366_000_093やっぱり、こんなこと続かないヨ。
この旅人さんに叩きのめされたのがいい機会ネ。
素直に自首して、罪を告白するネ……。

source: TEXT_LUCKZA024_03366_MORDOYASHIGE03366_000_094<tab>You are right. There must be easier ways to make money. We need something that requires less effort, less risk! Hmm...
TEXT_LUCKZA024_03366_MORDOYASHIGE03366_000_095<tab>Ahem! Kind traveler, will you accept this as an apology? And maybe no one needs to know about this, yes?
target:
TEXT_LUCKZA024_03366_MORDOYASHIGE03366_000_095旅人サン、迷惑をかけたネ。
慰謝料代わりに報酬を受け取ってヨ。
……それじゃネ。
